title: Retirement Saving and Cryptocurrency
description: MarketWatch reporters Alessandra Malito and Brett Arends discuss when cryptocurrencies belong in retirement plans, if ever, and the best way to approach these enticing investments.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: MarketWatch reporters Alessandra Malito and Brett Arends discuss when cryptocurrencies belong in retirement plans, if ever, and the best way to approach these enticing investments.
